Description:
Sold by Billy Chang 0423 010 737 of Ray White Ashburton.
This young quality architect designed townhouse offers you a comfortable modern and low maintenance living. Massive 25.33 sq (approx) building area includes three good size bedrooms and three living areas (All bedrooms with BIR and master bedroom with Ensuite). Designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and stone island bench top, open to a bright family area connected to the private backyard, timber floor, guest toilet downstairs, rear street double garage set with remote control door and storage area, central heating and cooling system has been efficiently divided to upstairs zone and downstairs zone. Skylight, water tank, all comes to 6 star energy rating living style.
Fantastic location: only a stone throw to Westall Train Station, minutes walk to shops on Rosebank Avenue, post office primary School and College. Short drive to Clayton shopping centre, Springvale shopping centre, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and Monash Free Way. Luckily there is a new IKEA on Princess Highway opening soon so you can deck out your new home. Great opportunity for first home buyer or investor. Just settle and enjoy.
Insights: 48 Botanic Drive, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2011 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Calling First Home Buyers, Owner Occupiers & Investors
Harcourts Clayton is proud to present one of its finest properties, in Clayton South
Words cannot describe the beauty of this 2 double bedroom Brick Veneer unit on land of approximately 400sqm. Close to all amenities, transport, shops and hospital. Offering:
-Own frontage
-2 Spacious bedrooms with BIR's
-Huge backyard
-Huge Living area,
-Kitchen with meals area
-Central bathroom
-Separate toilet
-Separate laundry
-Single Lock up Garage
-Ducted Heating
-Gas cooking
Be quick will not last long, all enquiries to Abba Khaimov: 0403 493 680

Description:
***UNDER OFFER*** An Immaculate Gem with Development Potential
Ready to move straight into, this original weatherboard home offers comfortable accommodation as is while providing plenty of scope for future development. With an existing floorplan offering the flexibility of 3 bedrooms or 2 with separate lounge & separate dining room, there's also a spacious & neat kitchen with meals and a tiled central bathroom. The home features ducted heating, an airconditioner & lock-up garage. For land lovers there's a deep West facing garden to take advantage of providing the perfect opportunity to subdivide (STCA). Located in a rapidly growing area with great access to parks, transport and Claytons thriving shopping strip. Land: 724.82sqm (15.85m x 45.73m)
Chris Karantzas : 0413 944 034

Description:
Immaculate Two-bedroom Villa Unit with Front Garden
This unit comprises 2 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, main bedroom with full ensuite, separate new large main bathroom with separate shower, new kitchen with gas cooking and Nobel appliances, spacious open plan living area with gas heating, 2 WC's, secure fenced front garden and a single carport. Close to train station, shops, Monash Medical Centre, parklands and Clayton shops and bus stop. Vacant procession. Potential rental return: $330 - $350 per week.

Plans & Permits For 8 Apartments Approved!
Fantastic opportunity for this 8 apartment development site with plans and permits all approved by the council ideal for the builder or developer looking to increase their portfolio in a high rental/high re-sale value area. Within walking distance to Clayton Train Station and only minutes away from Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Community Centre and Clayton shopping strip, this perfect site in one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs will not last long!
Featuring a weatherboard home with 3 bedrooms, updated kitchen and bathroom, floating floorboards, covered outdoor entertaining area, storage/tool shed, currently tenanted until 22nd March 2010 for $1347pcm.
Plans and permits comprises of 8 x 2 bedroom apartments with basement car parking.
Plans and permits available to view in office or by email.

Description:
A SHORT STROLL TO SCHOOLS, SHOPS & TRANSPORT
A fantastic opportunity is now available to live in high demand pocket of Clayton South - whether for investment or to live in it presents many opportunities.
Upon front entry be greeted with low maintenance front yard with plenty of space for 3 cars. Step inside and be welcome with an open hallway leading into good size lounge with glistening floorboards, gas ducted heating and A/C.
Flow through to the dining area and a modern and updated kitchen with ample storage resides. This original BV charmer comprises 3 good size bedrooms with sliding BIRs, recently refreshed with new painting and new fixtures and fittings installed - just move in and enjoy.
At the rear, use the extra extension space for family entertainment or home office - its private and secure.
Just a short stroll to Westall Primary and Secondary Schools, public transport, Westall local shops and amenities, a short drive to Springvale Plaza Shopping Mall, Clayton Shops and Monash University (Clayton campus) and easy access to all major arterials - it completes a magnificent opportunity. Make your enquiries with confidence today.
Chien Le : 0403 342 809

Description:
Plans & Permits Approved For 4 Townhouses On 877m Of Land
Situated in one of Clayton South's finest streets is this wonderful home appealing to both the homebuyer and the developer, located within walking distance to Westall Train Station, local schools, parklands and close to Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre as well as quick access to Monash Freeway.
Comprising: 3 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, central bathroom with toilet and shower over bath, renovated open-plan kitchen with gas appliances and dishwasher opening onto a spacious and sun filled lounge room great for entertaining with gas heating and air conditioning, beautiful polished flooring throughout, huge rear yard with paved outdoor area including a Jacuzzi and a large storage shed, all this on a generous allotment of 877sqm of land!
If this is not enough, this fantastic property also has approval from the council with plans and permits to construct 4 townhouses (2 double storey and 2 single storey). With fantastic re-sale values in the area, these opportunities don't come that often!

Description:
Calling First Home Buyers, Owner Occupiers & Investors
Harcourts Clayton is proud to present one of it's finest properties in Clayton South. Words cannot describe the beauty of this 2 bedroom brick veneer unit. With nothing to spend the Vendor hasn't cut any corners with this not so long ago renovated unit. Offering 2 spacious bedrooms with BIR's, bathroom with separate toilet and laundry tucked away separate from the bathroom. State of the Art kitchen with polished floor boards throughout, one enclosed parking and one outdoor parking too. Only 3 on the block and all are owner occupied, so the safety and security are all on offer here. A greatly respected street with public transport down the road, the shopping centre a short stroll and the University and Hospital at your door step this unit will surely be one of the first to rent out with a potential return of $1260 per month, this unit is sure to impress. Bring your cheque book to this one - you want be able to resist. Call Abba on 0403 493 680 or on email abba.khaimov@harcourts.com.au
Insights: 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Plans & Permits Approved For 3 Townhouses Ready To Build!
Fantastic development opportunity for this original condition 3 bedroom residence with plans and permits approved for 3 double storey townhouses arises in one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs with plans, permits, working drawings, landscape and drainage plans all completed and approved.
This rare residence set on a very wide frontage within approx. 1km to Clayton Train Station and surroundings including only minutes to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Community Centre is sure to get the blood boiling in any astute developer, builder and investor!
With huge re-sale values in the area as well as high rental yields, all the hard work has been already done, ready for you to commence construction in no time!
Currently featuring an original condition 3 bedroom 1 bathroom house returning $1474 per calendar month on a month-by-month tenancy.
Plans for 3 townhouses between 3-4 bedrooms up to 21 squares approx.
Plans and permits are available to view in office or by soft copy by email.
Auction: On site 11:00am on 11th December 2010
Terms: 10% deposit
Settlement: 60/90/120 days

Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.

Description:
It's All DoneWalk Right In And Relax
Set on a quiet street and within walking distance to shops, parklands and public transport, this beautifully renovated residence is everything you are looking for and more! Ideally located with easy access to Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and local primary and secondary schools.
Featuring fully renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and renovated laundry, with separate powder room. Includes lounge, dining room and open plan family room overlooking garden and courtyard.. Completely updated bathroom, magnificently polished floorboards, air-conditioning, gas log fire and four large bedrooms (main with BIR) or three large bedrooms and large study.
Expansive landscaped gardens lead you to a hidden self-contained bungalow complete with reverse cycle air-conditioning, double bedroom, kitchen, living and bathroom, perfect for multi generational family, visiting family and friends, or even an extra income while renting out to individuals. Additional features include converted garage, ample storage, covered front porch and off-street parking for two cars.
This superb home will appeal to a homebuyer looking for a modern lifestyle & relaxed living or the astute investor potentially searching for high rental returns.
Land approx 16.4 x 40.8 = 662sqm
